```{r}
library(taxonomizr)
```
Get SQL files
```{r}
prepareDatabase(getAccessions = FALSE)
```
Get taxonomy for our species of choice
```{r}
ids <- c("5076", "5077", "446515", "5061", "5059", "33178", "29001", "570640", "652027", "119955", "74413", "318706", "115983", "121624", "55181", "121619", "469762", "5297", "27344", "552628", "658196")

taxa <- getTaxonomy(ids,
            sqlFile = "nameNode.sqlite",
            desiredTaxa = c("superkingdom", "phylum", "class", "order", "family", "genus", "species"))
```

Create newick file
```{r}
output <- makeNewick(
	taxa,
	naSub = "_",
	excludeTerminalNAs = FALSE,
	quote = NULL,
	terminator = ";"
	)

cat(output, file = "JGItree.nwk")
```
